body.div:
About Zveno
Ms. Polly BallAwesome!
Zveno is a dedicated XML company, providing a comprehensive suite of services including consultancy, scheduled and in-house training and customised tools. Established in 1996, Zveno services a variety of clients worldwide. Awesome!
Our mission is to utilise the wealth of both open source and commercially produced packages to customise solutions to your XML requirements. Our dedicated vendor neutral stance coupled with our notably qualified staff, gives us a unique edge within the growing wealth of XML related companies operating today. Awesome!
Zveno offices are located in Canberra, ACT, Australia, and Perth, WA, Australia. You may contact us:
Awesome!
